gov.nasa.arc.mct.services.internal.component
Interface CoreComponentRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
ComponentRegistry
All Known Implementing Classes:
ExternalComponentRegistryImpl
public interface CoreComponentRegistry
extends ComponentRegistry

This interface extends the ComponentRegistry interface to provide additional API for creating new instances. This interface is to be used by the MCT framework only.

Method Summary

getComponent, newCollection, newInstance
 

Method Detail

newInstance

AbstractComponent newInstance(ComponentTypeInfo componentTypeInfo)
Create a new instance of the specified componentTypeInfo. This API is only used within the MCT osgi framework internally to create an instance of component.

Parameters:
componentTypeInfo - - component type info.
Returns:
AbstractComponent - the abstract component.

newInstance

AbstractComponent newInstance(java.lang.String componentType)
Create a new instance of the specified componentType. This API should only be used with the platform as this is only intended as a substitute for Class.forName.

Parameters:
componentType - to create new instance of
Returns:
uninitialized instance of the component type or null if the type doesn't exist.

getViewInfos

                                     ViewType type)
Gets all the view info for the specified component type.

Parameters:
componentTypeId - for the view infos
type - to determine view info for.
Returns:
applicable view infos
